name: Dungeon Dice Story GMTK Jam 2022
description:
Dungeon Dice Story is a fast paced turn based dice game with tons of replay value. Take on the dungeon boss, fight off their minions and save the day in this easy to play but tough to master action packed adventure.

The dice gods favor the bold. Or, at least they do when you control the dice in Dungeon Dice Story. With this turn-based game of strategy and luck, you’re free to upgrade your arsenal and launch powerful attacks against your opponents. You may even find yourself praying to the dice gods as you embark on your perilous journey.

How to Play

Jump into the world of Dungeon Dice Story! This is a turn-based strategy battle for the games table.

The Main Objective

Defeat the onslaught of familiar table top pieces with your team of dicey dungeon defenders. Defeat them all and save the realm!

Setup Phase
Players control a squad of dice (D4, D6, D10, D12, D20). Dice are queued up on screen take note of the order because the dice on screen make up your front line that will attack and defend as long as they live. 

Attack Panel
The attack panel presents players the different options to attack the table top minions. Each attack has to attributes:

    Roll Requirements

  • This is the number or set of number that you must roll to land your attack

   Dice Requirements

  • This is the number of dice you may roll to meet the roll requirement

Attack Phase

Once you've select your attack, launch your chosen attack and watch the dice roll.

Dice Attacks
Dice attacks will show each dice you've chosen and the number they've rolled. Watch carefully to see if your attacks roll requirements were met. 

The Enemy
The Enemy is made up of a regiment of familiar table to game pieces, and they are all PISSED! Fight off the enemy regiment one by with and watch their heart health counter to see how much damage you need to give to take them out. 

The Enemy Attack Phase
Once you attack has completed they enemy will then target a set of your front line defenders. The enemy can target any number of your front line defenders. 

Enemy Attack Power
Beware of the various attack icons (the skulls that appear before the enemy attacks), each icon signifies the intensity of the coming attack. Knowing this may help you plan out your next attack as your front line is hit and your squad begins to dwindle. 

ROLL THE DICE, SAVE THE WORLD!

Thanks For Playing

Enjoy the ALL ORIGINAL art and sounds of DICE and more!!!
